title: Luxury Top Floor 2 Bedroom 2 1/2 Bath Luxury Apartment
posting_body: Take your living experience to new heights and join us at the new Bridgeview 125 Apartments.
Ideally located, our University Place apartments blend seamlessly with the fast pace of the city while also providing a tranquil environment for you to enjoy and unwind at.
Utmost relaxation and stress-free lifestyle, that’s what comes attached with living on our finely landscaped grounds.

Our studios, one, and two-bedroom apartments are spacious, with ample storage space, and private patios or balconies, while the community amenities allow you to escape the noise of the city and feel like you are on holiday.

The kitchens invite you to hone your cooking skills, the living rooms are bright, and the bedrooms cozy, not to mention other conveniences like having a washer and dryer, tall ceilings, and window coverings.
We are currently showing by appointment only!
